# Editing 360 Photos

![](images/work-in-progress_200x118.png)

## Editing Tasks

### Stitching

- connecting adjacent images
- projecting into 360 format
- filling in the sky / nadir
- image corrections
   + lens distortion
   + vignetting
- color enhancements
   + contrast and brightness
   + color transformations

### Editing a Stitched 360 Image

- adding a nadir patch
- leveling
- (re)injecting 360 Metadata

### Tour Builders

360 tour builders create clickable links between 360 photos, as well as labels, clickable hotspots, popup windows, sounds and video, etc. 

There are both online and desktop tour builds. For more info, see the [Tours](tours.html) section.
